mapper.select: SELECT gameNo, gameName, gameImage, gamePrice, gameContent, gameContent, gameGenre, '('||to_char(gameReleasedDate,'yyyy')||')' as gameReleasedDate, gameCategory FROM game WHERE rownum < 11 ORDER BY gameReleasedDate DESC

SELECT game.gameNo, game.gameName, game.gameImage, game.gamePrice, game.gameContent, game.gameContent, game.gameGenre, '('||to_char(game.gameReleasedDate,'yyyy')||')' as gameReleasedDate, game.gameCategory FROM game, rate WHERE game.gameNo = rate.gameNo AND rownum < #{limit} ORDER BY rate.gameScore DESC, game.gameReleasedDate DESC

SELECT game.gameNo, game.gameName, game.gameImage, game.gamePrice, game.gameContent, game.gameContent, game.gameGenre, '('||to_char(game.gameReleasedDate,'yyyy')||')' as gameReleasedDate, game.gameCategory FROM game, rate WHERE game.gameNo = rate.gameNo AND REGEXP_LIKE (game.gameGenre, (SELECT NVL(REPLACE(mbrGenre, ',', '|'), '*') FROM member WHERE mbrId = #{mbrId} )) AND rownum < 11 ORDER BY rate.gameScore DESC, game.gameReleasedDate DESC
SELECT * FROM game,rate WHERE game.gameNo = rate.gameNo AND game.gameCategory = #{gameCategory} ORDER BY rate.gameScore desc, game.ReleasedDate desc
